data.title: The King David Report, A Novel by Heym, Stefan: Very Good condition Hardcover (1973) First American Edition.
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780399111976 - First American Edition. - Hardcover - G. P. Putnam's Sons, New York - 1973 - Condition: Very Good condition - Good dust jacket - New York: G. P. Putnam's Sons, 1973. Very Good condition in a Good dust jacket. The jacket is bright and unfaded but has a few small edge chips and something removed (price sticker?) leaving a mark. NOT price clipped ($6.95). The jacket is protected by a removable Brodart clear-plastic sleeve. NO owner's name or bookplate. NOT a remainder. Pages are clean and unmarked. 1973. First US Edition with "First published in the United States of America 1973" so stated. Bound in the original lavender cloth, stamped in bright gold on the spine. Complete with dust jacket. . First American Edition. Hardcover. Very Good condition/Good dust jacket. 8vo. 255pp. Great Packaging, Fast Shipping. - The King David Report, A Novel
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Orders sent to a Nevada address require payment of 8.375% sales tax (unless tax exemption cerification is provided). All items are guaranteed as described. We take pride in our book descriptions. Every item is carefully examined so that condition and other details are listed as accurately as possible. Our descriptions are protected by copyright, and unauthorized use is strictly prohibited. Violators will be prosecuted.

Returns: If not as described, your order is returnable in accordance with ABE'...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

We always take the time necessary to carefully package your order so that it arrives safely and securely. Sturdy boxes and/or stiff cardboard are standard. We never just use mailing bags without further protection. Shipping cost estimates are based on an average size book and are intended to cover only our actual out-of-pocket expenses. If you order includes multiple volumes, oversize, heavy or very valuable books, shipping cost estimates may not apply.
